statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ -2 \\ -4 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ -4 \\ 2 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -8 \\ -2 \\ 16 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -12 \\ 2 \\ 24 \\ 9 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
